attributes.action: Strip Hassanal Bolkiah, Sultan of Brunei, of all honorary British awards.
attributes.additional_details:
The following are the honorary awards Hassanal Bolkiah has received from Great Britain :-

Honorary Knight Grand Cross of The Most Honourable Order of the Bath (GCB)

Honorary Knight Grand Cross of The Most Distinguished Order of St Michael and St George (GCMG)

Honorary Companion of The Most Distinguished Order of St Michael and St George (CMG)

Honorary Air Chief Marshal in the Royal Air Force

Honorary Admiral in the Royal Navy
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, demand that Hassanal Bolkiah, be stripped of all honorary British awards. No one who passes laws to openly murder anyone deserves recognition. The British stand for diversity, love and tolerance. We must show we do not agree with the murdering of the LGBTQ+ community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture

You might like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251142
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253069
